revised_title: An Analysis of Holy Cross Parish Population and Demographics from 1770 to 1780
tldr: This article presents an analysis of the population and demographic changes in the Holy Cross Parish, Salop, from 1770 to 1780. It includes data on births, deaths, and marriages, as well as information on the impact of a devastating fire in 1774 and the subsequent rebuilding efforts. The author also discusses the limitations of using public registers for political arithmetic and suggests the importance of private records for accurate demographic studies.
